title: Riot we think it's about time, we make a champion with 20 Abilities..
body:
I think it's obvious that new champions get the best scaling, the best mobility, shields, new skills never seen before.

how about you give Annie a hp shield instead of the crap she has now?

OH I KNOW!!!

let's make the next new champion have 20 abilities, first Ekko, then you kinda went down with Yasuo. now we got {{champion:164}} , just DO IT, I know you want to.
